• VXLIB Function Reference
Warp Affine

OpenVX Function Description

  • Performs an affine transform on an image.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/d5/d5f/group__group__vision__function__warp__affine.html

VXLIB API

  • VXLIB_warpAffineBilinear_bc_i8u_c32f_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_warpAffineBilinear_i8u_c32f_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_warpAffineNearest_bc_i8u_c32f_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_warpAffineNearest_i8u_c32f_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
